title: Nil-by-mouth foodie: The chef who will never eat again
description: Loretta Harmes hasn't eaten or tasted food for six years, but she hasn't lost her passion for cooking.

title: Would universities call parents in a mental health crisis?
description: Bereaved parents call for universities to contact students' families to reduce risk of suicides.

title: Covid in Brazil: Hunger worsens in city slums
description: The country struggling to contain a Covid-19 surge faces a possible explosion of poverty.

title: These teenage climate activists are pushing for change in Australia
description: These teenage climate activists are pushing for change in Australia.

title: How cancer put me off joining Amazon union
description: Carla Jonson's story helps explain how Amazon won last week's union vote in Alabama.

title: Inside the chemist's made entirely out of felt
description: After wowing art lovers in the US and China, Lucy Sparrow's latest felt fantasy is her first UK show in five years.

title: The Zurich students living cheaply in a luxury hotel
description: Students in one of the world's most expensive cities get stunning views of Zurich in a former business hotel.

title: Who attended Prince Philip's funeral?
description: Covid restrictions mean only 30 mourners were allowed to attend the funeral of the duke.

title: Queen and Royal Family alone but for the gaze of the world
description: After a week of private grieving, this was the moment the Royal Family's mourning became public.

title: Prince Philip funeral: Pictures as Queen and nation bid farewell to the duke
description: Almost 100 years after he entered the world on a dining room table in Corfu, Prince Philip's final journey has taken place.

title: Prince Philip: Land Rover hearse and other personal touches at duke's funeral
description: Those watching closely noticed carefully placed references to the duke's remarkable life story.

title: Prince Philip funeral: Duke of Edinburgh laid to rest
description: The service was held at St George’s Chapel in Windsor Castle.

title: Girl, 6, donates 'lifetime of hair' to cancer charity
description: Six-year-old Amelia Barratt donates her locks and more than £800 to help children with cancer.

title: Prince Philip's funeral to mark his 'unwavering loyalty'
description: The Duke of Edinburgh's link to the Navy and love of the sea will be a focus of the Windsor service.

title: Covid-19 deaths pass three million worldwide
description: It comes as the World Health Organization warns of deaths and cases increasing at a "worrying rate".

title: What time is the funeral?
description: What time is the funeral for the Duke of Edinburgh and what will happen?

title: FA Cup: Chelsea's Thomas Tuchel says it's 'so nice and so hard' to face Pep Guardiola
description: Chelsea manager Thomas Tuchel say it is "so nice and so hard" to face the "strong belief" of Pep Guardiola's Manchester City in the FA Cup semi-finals at Wembley.

title: Biden backtracks on keeping Trump cap on refugees
description: A refugee organisation says the White House's explanation of the order is "completely false".

title: Bellator 257: Report, highlights and full replay
description: Vadim Nemkov meets Phil Davis at Bellator 257 while Corey Anderson ends his career and Britons Paul Daley and Saul Rogers feature - and you can watch the full event again on iPlayer.

title: Government 'risks public trust' without probes into ministers
description: Lord Evans says a number of allegations against ministers "haven't been completely investigated".
